blocks.name: nndivsub
blocks.content: Please add description here. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm nndivsub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, c2), cn)))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  imp32(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wi(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn)))
  com34(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  exp32(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn)))
  biimpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  sylan9bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c2), clt, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c2), clt, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))
  nnre(c0)
  nnre(c1)
  jca(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))
  nnre(c2)
  nngt0(c2)
  ltdiv1(c0, c1, c2)
  nnsub(co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  adantrr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wi(wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn)))
  sylan9r(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  expcom(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn), wcel(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn))
  nnaddcl(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, cdiv, c2))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cn))
  eleq1d(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn, co(c1, cdiv, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), co(c1, cdiv, c2)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc)))
  3impdir(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc)))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc))
  nnssi2(c0, c2, cc, wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  divcl(c0, c2)
  nnssi2(c1, c2, cc, wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  nnsscn()
  divcl(c1, c2)
  ancoms(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc), wceq(co(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
  npcan(co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c0, cdiv, c2))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wb(wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, c2), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), cn)))
  eleq1d(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, c2), cn, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, c2), co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c0, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c1, cc))
  nncn(c1)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c0, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  jca(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  nncn(c2)
  nnne0(c2)
  divsubdir(c1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: nndivlub
blocks.content: A factor of a positive integer cannot exceed it. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm nndivlub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
} = {
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  jca(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  nnre(c1)
  nngt0(c1)
  jca(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  nnre(c0)
  nngt0(c0)
  syl5ibr(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
  nnge1(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
  3anidm23(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1))))
  lediv2(c1, c0, c0)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  gt0ne0(c0)
  breq1d(co(c0, cdiv, c0), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  divid(c0)
}

blocks.name: cgcdOLD
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the gdc function. (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin: prop class cgcdOLD(class c0, class c1) { gcdOLD(c0, c1) }

blocks.name: diff.cgcdOLD.s
diff.cgcdOLD.c
diff.cgcdOLD.w
df-gcdOLD
blocks.content: ` gcdOLD ( A , B ) ` is the largest positive integer that evenly divides both ` A ` and ` B ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ee7.2aOLD
blocks.content: Lemma for Euclid's Elements, Book 7, proposition 2. The original mentions the smaller measure being 'continually subtracted' from the larger. Many authors interpret this phrase as ` A ` mod ` B ` . Here, just one subtraction step is proved to preserve the ` gcdOLD ` . The ` rec ` function will be used in other proofs for iterated subtraction. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ee7.2aOLD(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cgcdOLD(c0, c1), cgcdOLD(c0, co(c1, cmin, c0)))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wceq(cgcdOLD(c0, c1), cgcdOLD(c0, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  3eqtr4g(cgcdOLD(c0, c1), cgcdOLD(c0, co(c1, cmin, c0)), csup(crab(hs0, cn, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))), cn, clt), csup(crab(hs0, cn, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))), cn, clt), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  supeq1d(crab(hs0, cn, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))), cn, clt, crab(hs0, cn, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  rabbidva(hs0, cn, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)))
  pm5.32d(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))
  imp(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)))))
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn))))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)))))
  com23(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)))
  exp32(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wb(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cn)))
  nndivsub(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  df-gcdOLD(hs0, c0, c1)
  df-gcdOLD(hs0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cmin, c0))
}
